summary: Premium Photo Gallery frontend testing completed successfully. All 16 tests passed - gallery section renders correctly with proper heading, all 6 gallery images load successfully, lightbox modal works with prev/next navigation and close functionality, room cards display room numbers/titles/subtitles/tags, restaurant section has side-by-side layout, responsive design works on mobile viewport (cards stack), hover animations work on room cards, and no console errors detected.
seed_data_creation: None - component uses hardcoded gallery data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Premium Gallery component fully tested. All data-testid attributes verified: premium-gallery-section, gallery-front-elevation, gallery-room-103-104, gallery-room-114, gallery-room-201-202, gallery-room-207-209, gallery-restaurant, gallery-lightbox, lightbox-close, lightbox-prev, lightbox-next. All 6 gallery images in /app/frontend/public/gallery/ load correctly (front-elevation.jpeg, room-mountain-view.jpeg, lobby.jpeg, room-elegant.jpeg, room-scenic.jpeg, restaurant.jpeg).

tests_executed.test: Gallery heading 'Explore Mount View Hotel' present
Lightbox modal opens on image click
Lightbox close button present and functional
Lightbox prev/next navigation present and functional
Lightbox closes when close button clicked
All 6 gallery images load successfully (no broken images)
Restaurant section has side-by-side grid layout
Gallery section visible on mobile viewport
